data.text: Abalame anzai Salayi la ɠɛni doun zɔlɔɔni bɛ ɲɛgɛlɛin. Kɛlɛ duɔ anzanui ta ɠɛni zea, daaseigi ɠɛni ga Agaal, é ɠɛni ga Ezipete yooi zu nu.
É ɠɛni Abalame ma: «È kaa ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI la vaani bu ga gè doun zɔlɔɔ. Li, è ʋilɛ nà-duɔ anzanui ʋolu, tanisu nà doun zunu zɔlɔɔ ga maaʋele.» Abalame ziɛni ga anzai Salayi ná-tɛnɛ gooi.
Abalame anzai Salayi ná-duɔ anzanui, Ezipete nui Agaal zeɠeni, é fe sinigi Abalame ya ga anza. Abalame zeini niina Kanaan yooi zu, é kɛ ná ga kona puugɔ.
É ʋilɛni Agaal ʋolu, naa kogi zeɠe. Siɛgi zu é ɓɔɠɔ ɠaai ma ga kogi ɠa ma, é ɠɛni bɛlɛlala wɛlɛi wosu ná-duɔ deei ʋa.

Salayi ɠɛni Abalame ma: «Poomugi é zeelizu mà, ɗa ɠa è unma ɠasɔ ʋe. Nà ɓɔɠɔi ɠa gè nà-duɔ anzanui zeɠea, gè da è ʋolu, siɛgi zu é kaa la ga kogi ɠa ma, é ɗa bɛlɛlala wɛlɛi wo ga ze. Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛ ga tukpɔɠaaleʋe nui de yɔɠɔzu.»
Abalame Salayi wooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma: «Ɗa-luɔ anzanui ɠa è yeezu. So, eɠɛʋelei nɛai la è ʋɛ.» Salayi zɛba é ɗa sopele ɲɔu, eyɛsu naa ʋela ba.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-geezuɠeelai kaani ziɛungi ɠobaʋɛ teʋebai zu, nii é Suul ʋelei zu.
É ɠɛni ma: «Salayi ná-duɔ anzanui Agaal, mini ɠa è zeɠeai ná, mini ɠa è liizu ná?» É gooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma: «Nà ʋelazu nà-duɔ deei Salayi ʋa.»
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-geezuɠeelai ɠɛni ma: «Ɠale ma ɗa-luɔ deei ʋɔ bɛ, è ɓɔɠɔ unmaayei bɛ.»
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-geezuɠeelai ɠɛni ma mɔnɔ: «Nà è-mavofodai mɔinzu, toɠa mɔin gola, nu nɔpɛ ge la zooga é ʋa gaalu.»

É ɠɛni ma mɔnɔ: «Wɛlɛ, ɗa doun zɔlɔɔsu, toɠa ɠɛ ga zunu loun. Ɗa daasei pɛɛ ga Isemayɛle,16:11 Isemayɛle: Daaseigi nii ti maaɓuɠaai ʋa ta «GALA ge mɛnigɛ». mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI è woomɛnini ɗa-ɠoozuʋiligi zu.
Toɠa ɠɛ ga dɔɓɔi zu zoovalegi, toɠa ɠɛ ɛsɛ pɛ daalɔɠɔma, ɛsɛ pɛ ge ɠɛ daalɔɠɔma, toɠa zeɠe kɛɛɠɛlointi pɛ ba, é zei yɛ.»

Agaal ɓɔɠɔ ɠaazaɠani, é ɠɛ ma: «Gè GALA ɓɔɠɔi ɠaaʋɛ nɛi ɓaa, nii é nɔ̀un kaazu?» Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI nii é ɓɔɛni tɔun pɔ, é naa laasei pɛɛni ga Ata-Ɛle-Lɔyi.16:13 Ata-Ɛle-Lɔyi: Daaseigi nii ti maaɓuɠaai ʋa ta «ɗa ga GALAGI nii é kàazu».

Naa ɠa é ba, ma ɠɔlɔyeɠei laasei pɛai ga, Laɠayi-Loyi ɠɔlɔyeɠei,16:14 Laɠayi-Loyi ɠɔlɔyeɠei: Daaseigi nii ti maaɓuɠaai ʋa ta «nii é vulua, é ɗa kà, naa ná-kɔlɔyeɠei». Toɠa Kadɛseni ta Ɓelɛde zɔɠɔzuʋɛ.
Agaal doun zunu zɔlɔɔni Abalame ʋɛ, naa daasei pɛɛni ga Isemayɛle.
Abalame ná-konagi ɠɛni ga puulɔsaʋa maazu lɔzita (86), siɛgi zu Agaal Isemayɛle zɔlɔɔni la bɛ.
